SELECT A.* FROM (
SELECT MSOV.COMPANY_CD , MSOV.DIVISION_CD , MSOV.SO_NO , MSOV.SO_SEQ , MSOV.SO_TYPE , MSOV.SO_TYPE_NM , MSOV.ITEM_ID , MSOV.ITEM_NM , MSOV.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MSOV.COMPANY_CD,MSOV.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MSOV.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MSOV.ITEM_SPEC , MSOV.MATERIAL_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MSOV.COMPANY_CD,MSOV.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0005', MSOV.MATERIAL_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS MATERIAL_TYPE_NM , MSOV.CUSTOMER_CD , MSOV.CUSTOMER_NM , MSOV.SHIP_TO_CD , MSOV.SHIP_TO_NM , MSOV.SO_DATE , MSOV.SO_CONFIRM_DATE , MSOV.ORDER_QTY , MSOV.SHIPPING_QTY , MSOV.CANCEL_QTY , MSOV.REMAIN_QTY , MSOV.CURRENCY_CD ,(SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MSOV.COMPANY_CD,MSOV.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0017', MSOV.CURRENCY_CD, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS CURRENCY_NM , MSOV.UNIT_PRICE , MSOV.EXCHANGE_RATE , MSOV.AMOUNT , MSOV.LOCAL_AMOUNT , MSOV.TOTAL_AMOUNT , MSOV.TOTAL_LOCAL_AMOUNT , MSOV.SO_UNIT , MSOV.SO_UNIT_NM , MSOV.CUSTOMER_PO_NO , MSOV.CUSTOMER_ITEM_ID , MSOV.SALES_ITEM_ID , MSOV.SALES_ORDER_ID , MSOV.SALES_ORDER_ID AS GRID_ID , MSOV.UPDATE_DATE , MSOV.UPDATE_BY , MSOV.UPDATEBYNM , COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MSOV.COMPANY_CD,MSOV.DIVISION_CD ORDER BY MSOV.SO_NO, MSOV.SO_SEQ ) AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_SALES_ORDER_V MSOV WHERE MSOV.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MSOV.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MSOV.SO_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{soDateSD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{soDateED, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999
AND MSOV.SO_NO LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{soNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%'
AND MSOV.SO_TYPE IN (${soType})
AND (UPPER(MSOV.ITEM_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemIdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR UPPER(MSOV.ITEM_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemIdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND MSOV.CUSTOMER_NM LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{customerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%'
) A WHERE KEY_ID BETWEEN #{startPage, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND #{endPage, jdbcType=INTEGER}
